LanguageData.VQEA_AncientPipelineJunction_Off.label: ancient pipeline junction
LanguageData.VQEA_AncientPipelineJunction_Off.descrip: A junction of old chemfuel pipes that still leaks faint fumes. It can be tapped to extract a small amount of chemfuel, though no one knows its source.
LanguageData.VQEA_AncientPipelineJunction_On.label: ancient pipeline junction
LanguageData.VQEA_AncientPipelineJunction_On.descript: A junction of old chemfuel pipes that still leaks faint fumes. It can be tapped to extract a small amount of chemfuel, though no one knows its source. It can be tapped now.
LanguageData.VQEA_ArchiteCapsuleContainment_Empty.des: A containment unit built to store and release archite capsules for experimentation. It's empty.
LanguageData.VQEA_ArchiteCapsuleContainment.label: archite capsule containment
LanguageData.VQEA_ArchiteCapsuleContainment.descripti: A containment unit built to store and release archite capsules for experimentation. It still hums softly when approached. Can be opened to release an archite capsule.
LanguageData.VQEA_AncientGenepackCrate_Empty.label: ancient genepack crate
LanguageData.VQEA_AncientGenepackCrate_Empty.descript: A secure storage crate used to hold genetic data packs. It's empty now.
LanguageData.VQEA_AncientGenepackCrate.label: ancient genepack crate
LanguageData.VQEA_AncientGenepackCrate.description: A secure storage crate used to hold genetic data packs. It can be hacked open to recover the genepacks inside.
LanguageData.VQEA_StorageShelf_Empty.label: empty storage shelf
LanguageData.VQEA_StorageShelf_Empty.description: An empty, wobbly storage shelf. Anything of value is long gone.
LanguageData.VQEA_StorageShelf_Meals.label: survival meals shelf
LanguageData.VQEA_StorageShelf_Meals.description: A wobbly storage shelf containing packaged survival meals.
LanguageData.VQEA_StorageShelf_Medicine.label: medicine shelf
LanguageData.VQEA_StorageShelf_Medicine.description: A wobbly storage shelf containing medicine.
LanguageData.VQEA_StorageShelf_Neutroamine.label: neutroamine shelf
LanguageData.VQEA_StorageShelf_Neutroamine.descriptio: A wobbly storage shelf containing bottles of neutroamine.
LanguageData.VQEA_StorageShelf_Gowns.label: patient gowns shelf
LanguageData.VQEA_StorageShelf_Gowns.description: A wobbly storage shelf with stacks of patient gowns.
LanguageData.VQEA_AncientOrganBox_Empty.label: empty ancient organ box
LanguageData.VQEA_AncientOrganBox_Empty.description: An empty storage box with a built-in cooling system, typically used to preserve organs over extended durations.
LanguageData.VQEA_AncientOrganBox.label: ancient organ box
LanguageData.VQEA_AncientOrganBox.description: A secure storage box with a built-in cooling system, typically used to preserve organs over extended durations. Can be hacked open to release whatever remains inside.
